title: Missing Icon - Champie Caitlyn

embed.description: This Photo was uploaded by EarlessWinner.

body:
Hi, today I opened a random icon with 1500BE, and instead of showing me the icon I got, it showed me a chest saying that I got an icon from riot games... when I clicked "claim" the picture came up blank, and when I select the icon to be used on my profile, I just have a blank circle without a picture inside.
I went to my purchase history and it says that I bought the icon "Champie Caitlyn" but there is no picture available for it. I have tried restarting my client etc, but it is still blank. Anyone know of a fix?

replies.body: I got the Vayne Champie icon. https://imgur.com/83bHycg
I'd recommend you submit a ticket as well :)

The name doesn't sound like a real icon, it's likely a missed or placeholder file that ended up on live. Submit a ticket to player support and they should be able to fix it for you (you'll probs just get a diff icon).
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
This might be a stupid question, but if I just keep the placeholder, will I automatically get the new "champie caitlyn" icon when it's released?

~~You'll most likely just be left with a blank box from leftover files. It sounds like a placeholder that wasn't properly removed/replaced, rather than one for some upcoming icon.~~

~~If Caitlyn has one of those chibi icons that were in the BE store it seems likely that's the icon it's *meant* to be. I don't think they're meant to be available though mystery icons (only through the BE store) so I'd say that's likely the cause of the issue.~~

EDIT: Looks like you ended up with one of the as of yet unreleased "Mystery Mini" icons, so you may well be able to receive that icon from support once they're active. You may also just receive it automatically, I was under the impression it was one of the old ones :P. Pretty sure you're not meant to be able to get the new ones through regular random icons so good on ya :)
